title: Login Issue
description: User unable to login with correct credentials.

title: UI Bug on Dashboard
description: Misalignment in dashboard widgets on mobile view.

title: Slow Website
description: The website takes more than 10 seconds to load.

title: Payment Failure
description: Transaction not going through for credit card users.

title: Refund Request
description: Customer requesting refund for failed service.

title: Password Reset Issue
description: Password reset link not being received by email.

title: Email Not Sending
description: Automated email notifications are not being delivered.

title: Search Not Working
description: Search results are empty even for valid keywords.

title: File Upload Failed
description: Large file upload is failing with timeout error.

title: App Crash on iOS
description: iOS app crashes immediately on launch.

title: Account Locked
description: Customer account locked after multiple login attempts.

title: Chat Support Not Working
description: Live chat support is not loading on website.
